messages.title: Will you help me get rid of the Tories?
messages.content: Next week you have the chance to change Scotland for the better. The Labour party has a plan that will support families across Scotland with an energy price freeze, that will reward young people with a guaranteed job or training and the building of our NHS with 1000 more nurses paid for by a Mansion Tax. Only a vote for Labour can put an end to the Tories' extreme spending cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour party's plan to support families with an energy price freeze.
Labour party's plan to reward young people with a guaranteed job or training.
Labour party's plan to build the NHS with 1000 more nurses paid for by a Mansion Tax.

issues.health: Building our NHS with 1000 more nurses.

contactInformation.address: West Dunbartonshire Labour Party, 49 Langlands Terrace, Dumbarton, G82 2BG

images.caption: Gemma Doyle - Scottish Labour and Co-operative candidate for West Dunbartonshire.
